item.title: Some Practice on Implementing Signal Protocol With Python (1): X3DH
item.description: Lately I was working on a Web Security Project and I came across this very interesting Web Messaging Encryption Protocol - Signal Protocol.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a HBsc. in Co-op Computer Science Program, Software Engineering Stream at University of Toronto Scarborough. Currently, I am focusing on learning full stack development and Machine Learning. You may also get a pdf version Resume here. Education September 2017 - August 2021 (Expected) Candidate, Honors Bachelor of Science University of Toronto Scarborough Computer Science Specialist Co-op Program, Software Development Stream, 3rd Year; Received Entrance Scholarship issued in September 2017. Professional Sep 2018 - Apr 2019 Co-op DevOps Specialist; Fleet Complete Collaborated with development teams to speed up CI & CD

item.title: Email and GPG Keys
item.description: You can reach out to me through my university email jiasong.liang@mail.utoronto.ca (with the email’s GPG Key). The Key’s finger print is 4EE3 1C4E EDC3 F95B E281 E12A 3690 4D4E E025 9927.

item.title: Hello-World!
item.description: Welcome to my github page. Finally! At the end of 2019, I managed to launched my personal blog with the help of Hexo and archer theme. with the help of Hugo and Fuji theme. I will share my naive thoughts and experiences on coding here. ðŸ˜œ Hope you could find something helpful and interesting.
